author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sterling Resources Ltd. Provides Operations Update In Respect Of The Bretana Oil Field
text:
May 16 (Reuters) - Sterling Resources Ltd:
* STERLING RESOURCES LTD. PROVIDES OPERATIONS UPDATE IN RESPECT OF THE BRETANA OIL FIELD
* STERLING RESOURCES LTD - CO WILL COMMISSION OIL PRODUCTION FACILITIES IN BRETANA OIL FIELD, WITH FIRST PRODUCTION AS EARLY AS JUNE 2018
* STERLING RESOURCES LTD - INTENDS TO SELL INITIAL 1,000 BBL/D PRODUCTION FROM BRETANA FIELD AT IQUITOS REFINERY
* STERLING RESOURCES LTD - ANTICIPATES WELL IN BRETANA FIELD WILL BE OPENED TO ABOUT 2,250 BBL/D AFTER OCTOBER 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
